Detailed Description

Introduction

Overview

SDIO CSL provides a set of APIs to utilize the SDIO functionality provided C5515/C5505 DSP Hw controller. Hw devices that uses SDIO CSL should be compliant to SDIO specification. SDIO specification is the extension for the SD card specification.
